content: Last night I, I saw you standing and I started, started pretending that I knew you, and you knew me too. And just like a Roni, you were too shy. But you weren't the only 'cause so was I. And I dreamed of you ever since. Now I built up my confidence. Girl, next, next time you come my way, I'll know just what to say. Can we talk for a minute? Girl, I want to know your name.
author: Tevin Campbell
